head.supplied: I offer my homage and greeting to the Brisbane meeting, which, under his Excellency's patronage and your presidency, will vastly promote science and welfare throughout Her Majesty's Australian possess...

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3346in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3346in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: Letter not found. The text given here is from 'Australasian Association for the Advancement of Science ... Miscellaneous notes', Telegraph (Brisbane), 15 January 1895, p. 5. It is introduced by 'The president of the Australasian Association for the Advancement of Science (Hon. A. G. Gregory, C.M.G.) received a telegram from Baron von Mueller this morning couched as follows:'. The telegram is dated to 15 January, as it appears in the 'evening edition' of the newspaper. It was also published the next day in Brisbane courier, 16 January 1895, p. 6.

p.seg: I offer my homage and greeting to the Brisbane meeting, which, under his Excellency's patronage and your presidency, will vastly promote science and welfare throughout Her Majesty's Australian possessions.
